function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Symptoms related to quarantine reported in 28% of parents relative to 6% of those who were not quarantined.","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and psychological distress among parents due to quarantine.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and resources to parents who have experienced quarantine.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online therapy platforms, mental health apps.","People":"Parents who have been quarantined.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals."},{"Description":"9% of Hospital staff reported higher depressive symptoms 3 years after quarantine.","Impact":"Increased risk of long-term depressive symptoms among hospital staff who have experienced quarantine.","Mitigation":"Implement workplace mental health programs and provide access to counseling services for affected staff.","Technologies":"Workplace wellness apps, tele-counseling platforms, mental health screening tools.","People":"Hospital staff who have been quarantined.","Owner":"Hospital management, HR department."},{"Description":"Higher depressive symptoms were reported in subjects with higher rates of quarantine.","Impact":"Increased risk of depressive symptoms among individuals who have experienced quarantine, particularly those with higher rates of quarantine.","Mitigation":"Implement individual and group counseling services, provide mental health education, and promote social support networks.","Technologies":"Tele-counseling platforms, mental health education apps, support group platforms.","People":"Individuals with a history of quarantine, especially those with higher rates of quarantine.","Owner":"Mental health professionals, support group leaders."},{"Description":"Presence of alexithymic traits may reduce psychological resilience in some individuals.","Impact":"Increased risk of reduced psychological resilience and coping ability in individuals with alexithymic traits, leading to greater distress during quarantine.","Mitigation":"Provide targeted mental health interventions and support for individuals with alexithymic traits, including therapy and resilience-building programs.","Technologies":"Teletherapy platforms, mental health assessment tools, resilience training apps.","People":"Individuals with alexithymic traits who may experience quarantine.","Owner":"Mental health professionals, researchers."}]}
